Author: attick, daemitus, alymphocyte, grammernatzi, snorgy
Name: XIV Combo Expandedest
Description:
This is an enhanced version of XIVCombo with a variety of new added features.
This is mutually exclusive with other XIVCombo versions, so make sure they do not conflict!
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. Plus extras.
Changelog:
1.4.1.92:
* Shield Lob to Holy Spirit Movement Option added.
* Reprisal Lockout Feature now also includes Addle/Feint.
* Physical Ranged DPS Defense Cooldown Lockout Feature added.

1.4.2.0:
* Updated for 6.4.
* Removed Fairy Feature Selene Option. All hail healing Carbuncle.

1.4.2.2:
* Storm's Eye Onslaught Replacement Feature added.
* The Blackest Night to Oblation Feature added.

If a recent change isn't documented on this changelog, it is because it doesn't affect plugin functionality, or is a minor bugfix.
